item.title: Outrunning The Storm!
item.description: Can we outrun the storm? We're in a race against the clock to finish a job before the bad weather hits. This is the story of our biggest weather challenge yet.

media:content.media:title: Outrunning The Storm!
media:content.media:description: Can we outrun the storm? We're in a race against the clock to finish a job before the bad weather hits. This is the story of our biggest weather challenge yet.

item.title: The Grain Pits Are Flooding!!
item.description: The Grain Pits Are Flooding!!

item.title: Had To Call In Back Up!
item.description: When a job is too big to handle alone, you have to call for help. I'll tell you the story of a tough situation that required some backup to get the job done.

item.title: He Quit On His First Day Back!!
item.description: After returning to the job, he resigned on his very first day back. This is the story of a surprising career move and the reasons that led to the unexpected decision.

item.title: Had To Call In Back Up!
item.description: When a job is too big to handle alone, you have to call for help. I'll tell you the story of a tough situation that required some backup to get the job done.

item.title: New Salford Shows Up On Yard
item.description: The wait is over! Join us for a full tour of the newest addition to our fleet: a brand new Salford. We'll give you a first look and get it ready for its first big job.

item.title: We Can Get Anything Stuck!!!!
item.description: It seems like no matter what we drive, we can get it stuck. Watch as we get a piece of equipment stuck and what it took to get it out.

item.title: 4 Seasons And This Thing Is Shot! Very Disappointing!
item.description: A piece of equipment was supposed to last for years, but instead, it failed after only four seasons. We'll show you the issues and the difficult journey of repair.

item.title: Equipment Just Don’t Last! Rain Delay Repairs!
item.description: Equipment Just Don’t Last! Rain Delay Repairs!

item.title: She’s Finally Here! Setting Up the New Grain Cart for Harvest!
item.description: Join us for the big reveal! Our new grain cart is finally here, and we're getting it ready to tackle the busiest time of the year in the field.

item.title: We Can’t Catch A Break!! Stuck In The Dry Field!
item.description: This was supposed to be a simple day, but an unexpected mechanical issue left us stranded in the middle of a dry field. I'll tell you the story of how we tried to get unstuck.

item.title: Navigating The Struggles Of The Field
item.description: From unexpected equipment issues to tough weather, here’s what it’s really like navigating a day in the field.

item.title: Time To Plant Beans!
item.description: Join me in the fields as we get the bean crop in the ground and share tips for a smooth planting day.

item.title: Terribly Cold Weather and Grain Leg Issues
item.description: Terribly Cold Weather and Grain Leg Issues

item.title: THIS ALMOST WENT TO BED !
item.description: While working the land, a tractor leans dangerously to the side, showing just how unpredictable farming equipment can be in action.

item.title: Fire on the Farm!
item.description: A sudden blaze breaks out on the farm, forcing quick action to protect equipment, crops, and livestock before it spreads further.

item.title: Test Drives Always Leads To More!!!!
item.description: What starts as a simple test drive often uncovers unexpected features, fun, and surprises in every car we check out.

item.title: 4 Seasons And This Thing Is Shot! Very Disappointing!
item.description: I put the 4 Seasons to the test, and it didn’t live up to expectations. Here’s what went wrong and why I was let down.

item.title: Planter Wheel Breaks Off
item.description: I ran into trouble when a planter wheel snapped in the field—here’s how I handled it and kept progress moving.

item.title: Breaking In The New Tractor!
item.description: First day in the field with the brand-new machine—time to see what it can really do!
